DatabaseDriverInterface Interface Reference

Public Member Functions

 escape ($string)

Detailed Description

Interface that database drivers must implement.

Provides abstract methods for all the methods used by Database.

Version:
1.1

Definition at line 387 of file database.php.

Member Function Documentation

connect ( $  options  ) 

Connects to the database and selects a database.

Parameters:
array $options An array of connection options.
Returns:
bool True if connection succeeded, false otherwise. A return value of false will throw a DatabaseConnectionException exception.
Since:
1.0

Returns a string escaped using the vendor specific escape function.

Parameters:
string $string The string to escape.
Returns:
string The escaped string.
Since:

getArray (  ) 

Gets a single row from a query result as an array.

Returns:
mixed An array result on success, false on failure.
Since:
1.1
getError (  ) 

Return a string error from the last query.

Returns:
mixed String error message or false if last query was successful.
Since:
1.0
getInsertId (  ) 

Returns the insert id of the last query.

Returns:
mixed Integer insert ID if available, false otherwise.
Since:
1.0
getNumAffectedRows (  ) 

Returns the number of affected rows from the last query.

Returns:
mixed Integer number of affected rows if available, false otherwise.
Since:
1.0
getNumResultRows (  ) 

Returns the number of rows in a result.

Returns:
mixed Integer number of rows if available, false otherwise.
Since:

$  params = array() 
)

Gets a single row from a query result as an object.

Parameters:
string $className The name of the class to instantiate, defaults to StdClass.
array $params An array of parameters for the $className class constructor.
Returns:
mixed An object result on success, false on failure.

Parameters:

Returns:
